io.sphere.sdk.queries

Interface EntityQuery<I,R,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - Interface of the entity, i.e., Category interface
    R - Result of the query, i.e., CategoryImpl class
    M - (query) Model
    All Superinterfaces:
    Query<I,R>, Requestable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityQueryWithCopy<I,R,M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryQuery, EntityQueryWithCopyImpl, EntityQueryWithCopyWrapper

    public interface EntityQuery<I,R,M>
extends Query<I,R>
    Queries for entities with getters and copy functions for where, sort, limit and offset
